product_name: CliniqueAll About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique All About Eyes is a refreshing lightweight eye cream that reduces the look of puffiness and dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesEye cream reduces the look of puffiness and undereye circles.Eye area feels soothed with hydration and looks brighter and refreshed.Absorbs easily into skin.Provides the perfect silky-smooth base for foundation or concealer.Dermatologist tested.Ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsThis eye-brightener is packed with powerhouse ingredients, including vitamin C and, caffeine, and whey protein.Research ResultsVisibly depuffs and reduces the look of dark circles in 4 weeks.**Clinical testing on 32 women, after using the product for 4 weeks.Item 2153460How To UseUse eye cream twice a day, morning and nightWith ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motionIngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Water / Aqua / Eau, Isostearyl Palmitate, Polyethylene, Butylene Glycol, Polysilicone-11, Ethylene / Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Morus Bombycis (Mulberry) Root Extract, Caffeine, Phytosphingosine, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat Bran) Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Whey Protein / Lactis Protein / Protéine Du Petit-Lait, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Cholesterol, Linoleic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine Dipalmitate, Sucrose, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Laurate, PEG / PPG-18 / 18 Dimethicone, Quaternium-18 Bentonite, Petrolatum, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Metabisulfite, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use eye cream twice a day, morning and nightWith ring finger, apply sparingly to entire eye area using a gentle patting motion
ingredients: Whey Protein / Lactis Protein / Protéine Du Petit-Lait

reviews.headline: Wakes Up Tired Eyes
reviews.comments: I have tried many underage creams but I keep coming back to Clinique All About Eyes.  It helps to diminish fine lines and wake up tired eyes.  I don't think anything affordable will eliminate the under eye bags but this eye cream helps to minimize them.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: I recently purchased this online and once I received it, I used it the first night. I noticed a significant difference in the morning and for the next several days however, it hasn't been working as good as it was initially would I buy it again? I'm not sure but I like it right now

reviews.headline: Love this eye cream!
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing and works good. I keep buying again

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I did not see nor feel the eye cream experience many talk about.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product again and again!
reviews.comments: This eye cream, by far,  does more for my under eye area than any other product I've tried! It keeps my skin hydrated, calm, less redness and  dark circles, and no irritating fragrance near my sensitive eyes!  I'm a longtime fan!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Great for dark circles and puffy eyes been using it for year

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way
reviews.comments: I love this cream.  It's moist soft, and light.  You need just a little bit because a little covers a lot.  I will be buy in another one.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Been using this product for almost 2 weeks, I've noticed my eyes aren't so puffy.

reviews.headline: Very soothing as I had some kind of allergic reaction.
reviews.comments: This reaction affected my eyelids and they turned red and skin was very dry.

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments:
I have to use this because have not found one better even though none take away the undereye
puffs very well.  It does keep away wrinkles at corners of eyes.

reviews.headline: i enjoy this item and will be repurchasing
reviews.comments: this item gets rid of my dark circles and the creases in my under eyes. it works smoothly with makeup and makes me look glowin! i would recommend this item to people who are looking for a good eye cream that isn't that isn't pricey and actually works

reviews.headline: Go to eye cream
reviews.comments: Bought this once during beauty steals and loved it! Moisturizing and sets in quickly so I can apply my concealer without waiting forever. Perfect for busy mornings!

reviews.headline: The best eye cream!!
reviews.comments: I have tried so many different eye creams but I keep returning to this Clinique All About Eyes because it has the perfect amount of moisture. I can wear this in the heat and humidity of Summer without it feeling heavy or greasy.

reviews.headline: Does not improve my undereye bags at all.
reviews.comments: The texture is nice and smooths my skin but it does not reduce the swelling under my eyes. I'm really disappointed in this product.

reviews.headline: I continue to buy this product
reviews.comments: Just the perfect cooling feeling my eye area needs.  Feels great.

reviews.headline: My favorite eyecream
reviews.comments: Love this eyecream my favorite

reviews.headline: all
reviews.comments:
Not the first time that I have used this product. 
Really like it.

reviews.headline: Been buying this for years!!!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love 'All about eyes' it's very delicate for my sensitive skin. If you have sensitive puffy eyes, this is the eye cream for you. A little goes a long way. I use it morning and night. Great for dark circles and allergy eyes.

reviews.headline: Second jar, so far so good
reviews.comments: I'm in my early 30s and I've been noticing some lines around my eyes. I decided to try this because I love Clinique, and it did not disappoint. I love that it absorbs quickly and hydrates well.

reviews.headline: My favorite eye cream
reviews.comments: This is my favorite eye cream so far. I love the consistency and texture, no smell, no stinging. I feel like it helps with puffiness and keeps my eyes moisturized. I'm in my 3rd jar.

media.headline: After a week of use it had to go
media.caption: Eyes are very swollen and look unusually sallow

faceoff_positive.comments: This eye cream is wonderful. It has almost completely eliminated the fine lines around my eyes. It's very hydrating. Tip: in the summer, put it in the fridge. Really takes away puffiness and cools in the hot summer months.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best eye cream

faceoff_negative.comments: After trying my free sample with purchase, I was impressed by it. It's silky and lightweight on skin but whether it worked to eliminate dark under eye shadows or whether I imagined it...I don't know! Regardless, I returned to buy the large jar of this with the impression it'd last me. I haven't read the reviews yet but if anyone else has mentioned how quickly this stuff evaporates..it's true, and not just me! I apply it lightly but by the look of this two and a half week old jar you'd think I was using it as a face cream. I won't be be purchasing it again...it doesn't last long enough for the price
faceoff_negative.headline: Not the holy grail!

rollup.name: All About Eyes Eye Cream with Vitamin C
